default_return_amount.label: Order amount for default return label, from

default_return_method.label: Default shipping method for return labels

invoicelinetotal.label: Send InvoiceLineTotal (for shipments from US to Canada and PR only)

OverweightIndicator.label: Overweight Indicator
OverweightIndicator.comment: Indicates whether or not at least one package is over 70 lbs or 32 kgs

PaymentMethod.label: Payment Method
PaymentMethod.comment: Required field. For countries and (or) zip codes where pickup is free of charge, please submit 00, means no payment needed as payment method. If 01 is the payment method, then ShipperAccountNumber and ShipperAccount CountryCode must be provided. If 03 is selected, then CreditCard information should be provided. If 04 is selected, then the shipper agreed to pay for the pickup packages. If 05 is selected, then the shipper will pay for the pickup with a check or money order.

SpecialInstruction.label: Special Instruction
SpecialInstruction.comment: Special handling instruction from the customer (1...57 length)

ReferenceNumber.label: Reference Number
ReferenceNumber.comment: Information entered by a customer for internal reference (1...35 length)

ConfirmationEmailAddress.label: Confirmation Email Address
ConfirmationEmailAddress.comment: Email addresses to confirm the pickup. No more than five email addresses are allowed. Enter separated by commas.

UndeliverableEmailAddress.label: Undeliverable Email Address
UndeliverableEmailAddress.comment: The email address to use when the Confirmation Email Address is not reachable

frontend_multipackes_enable.label: Create packages for each Product in an Order?

track_send.label: Send tracking number on customer email

credit_grid_column_enable.label: Add column "Price" in credit memos grid?
